title: Cap Stand, mid-18th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: On pierced globe a cartouche of houses with cowherd and cows, and a bouquet. Flowering ring pedestal. Blue with accents of violet (manganese).

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Stand, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Earthenware; faience, underglaze decoration. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-60-7.
